title: Emperor of Steel - Novel Updates
tags: Antihero Protagonist   Aristocracy   Bloodlines   Curses   Debts   Demons   Economics   Handsome Male Lead   Magic   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Past Plays a Big Role   Reincarnation   Revenge   Romantic Subplot   Sword And Magic   Weak to Strong
author: Gangchan   강찬
description:
Shaymon, the man who has achieved the apex of dark magic, is framed as being a Demon King and is killed.

'I will not let it end like this!'

He finally achieves new life but reality was cruel. Being born after 500 years, he was born as the descendent of his rival, the Sword Emperor!>
